integration_requirements.title: SETA Funding Integration
integration_requirements.description: Implement SETA funding management system with funding type identification, status tracking, document management, and financial tracking.
comments:
SETA funding management system:
- Funding type identification:
  * AET Communication
  * AET Numeracy
  * GETC AET modules
Implementation requirements:
- Funding status tracking
- Automatic validation rules
- Document management
- Integration with class creation:
  * Funding checkbox in class setup
  * Automatic exam selection
  * Special reporting requirements
- Financial tracking:
  * Funding amounts
  * Payment schedules
  * Reconciliation reports

integration_requirements.title: Exam System Integration
integration_requirements.description: Implement comprehensive exam management with exam type categorization, automatic scheduling, venue management, and results tracking.

subtasks.title: Add automatic scheduling based on class progression

comments:
Comprehensive exam management:
- Exam type categorization:
  * Internal assessments
  * External examinations
  * SETA examinations
Core features:
- Automatic scheduling based on class progression
- Venue management
- Examiner allocation
- Results tracking
- Certificate generation
- Integration with learner profiles
- Automated notifications

integration_requirements.title: Portfolio Management System
integration_requirements.description: Implement digital portfolio handling with upload functionality, processing features, and management tools.
comments:
Digital portfolio handling:
- Upload functionality:
  * Bulk upload support
  * File type validation
  * Size limitations
- Processing features:
  * Automatic categorization
  * OCR for physical documents
  * Metadata extraction
- Management tools:
  * Version control
  * Review system
  * Feedback mechanism
- Integration points:
  * Learner profiles
  * Assessment tracking
  * Progress monitoring

integration_requirements.title: Agent Order Number Generation
integration_requirements.description: Implement automated agent numbering system with unique identifier generation and management features.
comments:
Automated agent numbering system:
- Unique identifier generation:
  * Sequential numbering
  * Region/area codes
  * Class type indicators
- Integration requirements:
  * Class assignment
  * Agent profile
  * Reporting system
- Management features:
  * Number tracking
  * History logging
  * Search functionality

integration_requirements.title: Backup Agent System
integration_requirements.description: Implement backup agent management with agent matching system, assignment features, and tracking features.
comments:
Backup agent management:
- Agent matching system:
  * Skill level matching
  * Availability checking
  * Geographic location
- Assignment features:
  * Automatic suggestion
  * Manual override
  * Notification system
- Integration points:
  * Agent profiles
  * Class schedules
  * Absence management
- Tracking features:
  * Replacement history
  * Performance monitoring
  * Client feedback

integration_requirements.title: Global Integration Requirements
integration_requirements.description: Implement global integration requirements for all systems including WordPress core integration, GeneratePress theme compatibility, and MVC architecture.
comments:
Global Integration Notes:
- All systems must integrate with WordPress core
- Follow GeneratePress theme compatibility
- Maintain MVC architecture
- Implement proper error handling
- Support mobile responsiveness
- Enable data export/import
- Provide API endpoints where needed
